scripts.build:circuit:compile: npx circom circuits/withdraw.circom -o build/circuits/withdraw.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/withdraw.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/withdraw.json --pk build/circuits/withdraw_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/withdraw_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:contractcopy: sed 's/\^0.5.0/>=0.5.0/g' build/circuits/WithdrawVerifier.sol | sed 's/gas/gas()/g' | sed 's/@return//g' | sed 's/contract Verifier/contract WithdrawVerifier/g' > contracts/WithdrawVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:contract && npm run build:circuit:contractcopy
scripts.build: mkdir build && npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract
